simplenlg.test.xmlrealiser
Class Tester

java.lang.Object
  simplenlg.test.xmlrealiser.Tester

public class Tester
extends java.lang.Object

This class is intended for regression testing of the XMl realiser framework. It works by accepting an xml file (representing the test cases) and a path to the lexicon file to use, and instantiating an XMLRealiser to map the XML to simplenlg objects. It outputs the results in an XML file, named like the input file (with the suffix out), in which the realisation has been appended to each test case.

Author:
Christopher Howell, Agfa Healthcare Corporation

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
The main method. The arguments expecetd are:
  1. -test
  2. path to xml file with recording element, or to a directory containing such files, OR path to file with request element, or to a directory containing such files
  3. path to the file containing the NIH DB lexicon to use

Parameters:
args - the arguments
